title: Item Sets in Alpha Client.
body: I really think you should add Item sets to Alpha Client,  I have always played league with item sets, esp when I am learning a champion and for all my off meta builds and it really helps to have all your situational items right there at a glance along with your normal items.  I am constantly switching back to Legacy Client to alter item sets and making item sets.  Item sets is actually one of the more useful tools of league.  Plus it has been proven in ranked to speed up the time people spend in shop, since almost noone uses the items shown on the recommended.

replies.body: Do you know what the problem with Riot is?  They don't care what we the players want, all they care about is our wallets. {{champion:28}}
I just heard that some new features where just added to the new client.  Well I don't care.  Still not gonna use the new client till item sets have been returned.
